19Looking ahead: ESG integration enhancements
With a focus on advancing our ESG integration practices, our research teams are continuing to expand 
and refine their approach to integrating ESG factors into the bottom-up, fundamental research process. 
Aegon AM is actively researching the extension of ESG integration to other aspects of the investment process, such as strategic asset allocation, structured finance and private markets. 
Additionally, as data becomes more standardized, more widely available and more trustworthy, we expect ESG to play 
an increasingly important role in some aspects of our investment process. Looking ahead, we believe it will be possible to deepen ESG integration in asset classes other than equity and fixed income.
